Articles.Content:
Is there any way to toggle the display of contracts in the Tracking Center?  I'm not crazy about how when I go to the Tracking Center my display is all mixed up with all the possible orbital changes, etc.

I guess I could just go to Mission Control and just decline everything, but I would have to just keep doing that when new contracts appear.  Is there any way to simply toggle them on/off?

Thanks!

Moving to Gameplay Questions.

21 hours ago, ThirdHorseman said:

 Is there any way to simply toggle them on/off?

As far as I know, no, there isn't.
